channel.title: API Reference on AsCode - Terraform Alternative Syntax
channel.description: Recent content in API Reference on AsCode - Terraform Alternative Syntax

item.title: built-in
item.description: builtin package represents the predefined, Terraform domain-specific,functions and types in the scope of any thread of AsCode. This meansthat is not required to use the load statement, and any of the functioncan be called without any prefix.

item.title: docker
item.description: The docker modules allow you to manipulate docker image names.

item.title: encoding/base64
item.description: base64 defines base64 encoding & decoding functions,often used to represent binary as text.

item.title: encoding/json
item.description: json provides functions for working with json data

item.title: encoding/yaml
item.description: yaml provides functions for working with yaml data

item.title: http
item.description: http defines an HTTP client implementation

item.title: math
item.description: math defines mathematical functions, it’s intended to be a drop-insubset of python’s math module for starlark: https://docs.python.org/3/library/math.html

item.title: os
item.description: os provides a platform-independent interface to operating system functionality.

item.title: path/filepath
item.description: filepath implements utility routines for manipulating filename paths in away compatible with the target operating system-defined file path

item.title: re
item.description: re defines regular expression functions, it’s intended to be a drop-insubset of python’s re module for starlark: https://docs.python.org/3/library/re.html

item.title: time
item.description: time defines time primitives for starlark

item.title: url
item.description: url parses URLs and implements query escaping.
